data.text: The rooms are spacious enough with a well equipped kitchen which is great to have when travelling with toddlers. The room service was quick and the staff were very courteous and helpful. The room cleaning was done everyday even without requesting, which was great. the breakfast spread was sumptuous. Overall had a great stay at this hotel.
data.title: Great hotel for family

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It is most kind of you to share your experience with other guests and we appreciate you for taking your valuable time to write this review. 

Savoy Central Hotel strives to blend service & comfort with efficiency at the hands of enthusiastic staff offering a warm welcome and unparalleled levels of hospitality. Thank you for your generous words of appreciation for all the staffs which means a lot to us.

We look forward to welcome you back to your home at the Savoy Hotels in Dubai.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny. 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text:
Excellent service very neat rooms good staff, however for vegetarians the variety can be increased. 
Also if possible try to review your mineral water policy. 
Overall "MASHALLAH" Experience. Nice location to experience old dubai very near to meena bazzar and other areas.
data.title: Nice Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

All of us at Savoy Central are really touched with the wonderful review.

We are so glad to learn that we could contribute towards making your entire stay more special. We appreciate your kind words.

We have noted your recommendations very positively for future considerations. 

Creating awesome memories is indeed our prime focus and your praise and recommendation is a huge motivation for the team in this regard.

The Savoy Hotels in Dubai eagerly awaits your return many more times!

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text: Excellent affordable hotel with convenient location, not too far from the airport, near the Abra station and the gold souk. This hotel has large room and confortable bed. Furniture is a bit aged. Very nice and pleasant staff, specially Lerma at the reception desk, Sahidan at the pool and Bhanean. A special thanks to the hotel for accomodating us for an early check in as our long flight landed in the morning, we really appreciated it. Buffet breakfast is ok. Two supermatkets are within a few minutes walk from the hotel.
data.title: Good hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

The entire team at Savoy Central thank you for taking time to post your experience. 

Your compliments for our services have been shared with all the staffs including Lerma, Sahidul & Bhawan. We are delighted to learn that we could make your stay memorable. 

It is our constant endeavor to deliver our best. Your appreciation increases our motivation to continually aspire to meet and exceed the guests’ expectations. 

The Savoy Hotels, with its convenient location in the centre of the city in Dubai, is close to the business, financial and shopping arcades, making it an ideal hotel both for a business traveller as well as for a family get-away.

We look forward to welcome you back soon.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny. 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text: We had a fantastic stay at Savoy Central. Great rooms, great hospitality, great Wifi. I recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to stay on Rolla Street. Special mention to the Resident Manager Reshma Almeida, the reservation staff Ahmed, Alfred, Avinash, housekeeping staff Ganesh and others (I do not know the names of everyone!). There are many restaurants nearby, including good options for Indian food. The street also has a few super markets. The hotel is at a convenient location.
data.title: Fantastic stay at Savoy Central

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It is a pleasure to receive your positive comments for Savoy Central Hotel.

We are happy to learn that you had a pleasant stay and found our service standards to be consistent enough to merit continued visits to our hotel.

Constant efforts are put in to train our team on the importance of personalized and unobtrusive service. It is so encouraging to know that our team members are successfully delivering on this front.

Your appreciation has been conveyed to all the staffs including Reshma, Ahmed, Alfred, Avinash & Ganesh. We all humbly thank you for the same.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny
Group General Manager
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text: Our stay at Savoy was exceptional! From the warm welcome to the spacious and impeccably clean room, everything exceeded our expectations. The staff provided impeccable service, and the amenities, the staff is very good, kind, understands guest requirements and takes of everything, they are top-notch.  The hotel is also at a very good location, very close to Frames, Meena Bazar, Beach, Downtown Dubai mall , Burj Khalifa. Highly recommend for a memorable stay with family!
data.title: Highly recommend for a memorable stay with family!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your review. 

Your heart-warming praise and kind words of appreciation have been received with humble gratitude and genuine delight by all of us at the Savoy Central

We constantly strive to provide our guests with a memorable service experience and we are delighted that we were able to deliver this to you.

Many thanks once again for taking the time to write this review. We are so proud to have you as an ambassador of the Savoy Hotels in Dubai and hope to welcome you back soon.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny
